title: Engin Cycles’ dropper-friendly seat collar adds new size, stems drop prices
content:
When Drew Guldalian of Engin Cycles says he’s been busy in the shop with projects for the last year, you know it’s going to be good. A new, smaller 31.8 Seat Collar joins their 34.9mm size and should make many roadies, gravel cyclists, and 27.2mm seatpost lovers very happy. The meticulous in-house machining promises a […]

The post Engin Cycles’ dropper-friendly seat collar adds new size, stems drop prices appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Chelsey Magness
